data.text:
Hi @neilbosworth 

Below is the section from the spec.
Please elaborate on what the difference is between 1 & 3.

Court vs Attorney Comparison Report

1. A report to show which cases were extracted from the attorney application before the capturing application.

2. A report to show which cases were extracted from the capturing application before the attorney application.

3. A report to show which cases were extracted from the attorney application that were never extracted from the capturing application.


Gillian - please remove the completed reports from the checklist and replace with the above 3 reports.


@willemhuman @gillianoberholzer @cobuspienaar
